level.heading: Disposition of profits.
level.text: The Mayor is authorized to retain any accumulated profits from a prison industries program for the purpose of acquiring or improving personal property, or to increase working capital to planned operating levels in a prison industries program. The Mayor is also authorized to retain accumulated profits from a prison industries program for payments to inmates employed in a prison industries program as well as to other inmates.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-117
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-117, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 24-231.01.
